author: Staff Reporter
text:
Arsha Kalarangam, the forum started by Swami Dayananda Saraswati to promote classical Indian fine arts, will be held on Sunday at Mani High School at 6 p.m.

A release from the organisers here says that R. Vedavalli, Chitravina N. Ravikiran, T. Rukmini, Karaikudi R. Mani, Neyveli R. Santhanagopalan, Shanta Dhananjayan and V.P. Dhananjayan will get the ‘Arsha Kalabhushanam’ award this year.

Swami Omkarananda Saraswati and Aruna Sairam, an Arsha Kalabhushanam awardee, will enthral the audience, the release said.

The Arsha Vidya Gurukulam has been giving the Arsha Kalabhushanam awards since 2007.
title: Arsha Kalarangam today
